caption:
This image features a bright red fire hydrant prominently displayed in the foreground on the left side of the frame. The hydrant is traditional in style, with a rounded top and multiple nozzles. It is situated on a patch of ground with mixed grass and soil, showing some stones and small plants near its base.

In the background, there's a rural scene including a winded dirt road that stretches from the foreground into the distance, where it curves to the right. Along the side of this road, a small yellow sign with black writing can be seen, though the text is not readable from this distance. Scattered along the road are several rocks serving as a makeshift edge. The road is bordered by lush green grass and trees. In the far background, more dense patches of trees or bushes can be seen, contributing to a calm and serene landscape under a sky filled with large, fluffy white clouds against a bright blue backdrop. The photograph emits a peaceful, rustic vibe, typically found in countryside settings.
title: Developers sign, evidence of land speculation in Puna area near Kalapana. Volcanic soil and arid conditions inhabit agriculture, making land speculation popular in this area. Land use laws enacted in 1961 are a restricting factor.
